title: Open Channel Management - CrossSection
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic Cross-Section made for Raw-Water (Open Channels) System Management domain. A CrossSection defines any point of the system where raw-water properties are monitored by a device and/or computed via simulation.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be CrossSection.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

attachedTo.description: Relationship. A relationship to the ID of the channel where the cross-section 'lives in'. Reference to an entity of type Channel.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

observedBy.description: Relationship. A relationship to the ID of the device that monitors raw-water properties. Model:'https://smart-data-models.github.io/dataModel.Device/device-schema.json'

position.description: Property. Object providing information about the distance with the rest of the elements and a relationship with them.

distance.description: Property. The distance between this Entity and a reference point (e.g., the most upstream point of the system).

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity.
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity.

refPoint.description: Relationship. The reference point distance is measured from.

waterFlow.description: Property. Water flow at the cross-section.

waterVelocity.description: Property. Water Velocity at the cross-section.

waterTemperature.description: Property. Water temperature at the cross-section.

turbidity.description: Property. Water turbidity at the cross-section.

specificConductivity.description: Property. Water conductivity at the cross-section.

waterLevel.description: Property. Water level at the cross-section.

energyHead.description: Property. The total energy head at the cross-section.

CrossSectionGeometry.description: Property. The geometry of the cross-section. Enum:'Trapezoidal, Circular'.

bottomSlope.description: Property. The bottom slope of the channel where the cross-section 'lives in'. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

leftSideSlope.description: Property. The slope of the left bank of the cross-section (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

rightSideSlope.description: Property. The slope of the right bank of the cross-section (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

bottomWidth.description: Property. The bottom width of the cross-section (for 'Trapezoidal' geometry). All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

diameter.description: Property. The diameter of a circular cross-section.

maxWaterDepth.description: Property. The maximum allowable water depth at the cross-section. All units are accepted in CEFACT code.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

inheritsFrom.description: Relationship. URI of a Channel component from which the value of a property is obtained.
